text: The crazies on the left have a harder time spreading conspiracy theories and false stories. They try, but the audiences reading far left publications are also reading credible sources with journalistic ethics so the bad stories are challenged and have trouble spreading.
author: peretti

text: They provide evidence the right wing media ecosystem is more isolated and self-reenforcing without a feedback loop for correcting errors or bad information. The right wing audience isn't also reading mainstream sources so their isn't the same accountability you see on the left.
author: peretti

text: There is a strong desire by Facebook and others to find a non-partisan solution but that might not be possible if there is an asymmetry between the structure of the left and right wing media. This story supports the thesis for this book ->
